organic.title: Tri-City Union Gospel Mission | Pacific Northwest National Laboratory
organic.snippet: The Tri-City Union Gospel Mission began serving Benton and Franklin counties over 57 years ago, providing rescue ministry to the broken, bruised, and needy.
